H0.text: Stroking the coil with a piece of silk is the best way to generate an electrical current in a coil of wire.

H1.text: Heating the coil uniformly is the best way to generate an electrical current in a coil of wire.

H2.text: Laying the coil near a magnet is the best way to generate an electrical current in a coil of wire.

H3.text: Rotating the coil in a magnetic field is the best way to generate an electrical current in a coil of wire.

A4.text: the disc is rotated in a uniform magnetic field perpendicular to the disc, causing a current to flow in the radial arm due to the Lorentz force
